hero.description: Transform customer interactions with our cutting-edge AI chatbots. Automate support, boost engagement, and scale your business 24/7.
hero.chatUser: How can AI help my business?
hero.chatAi: I can help automate customer support, answer questions 24/7, and provide personalized recommendations to increase engagement!

features.description: Our AI chatbots come packed with features designed to transform how you interact with customers.

items.title: Natural Conversations
items.description: Advanced NLP ensures human-like conversations that understand context and intent.

items.title: Lightning Fast
items.description: Instant responses powered by optimized AI models for seamless customer experience.

items.title: Enterprise Security
items.description: Bank-grade encryption and compliance with GDPR, SOC2, and industry standards.

items.title: Multi-language Support
items.description: Communicate with customers worldwide in their native language automatically.

howItWorks.description: Get started with our AI chatbot in three simple steps.

steps.title: Tell Us Your Needs
steps.description: Share your business requirements and goals. We'll understand your unique challenges.

steps.title: We Build & Customize
steps.description: Our team configures and trains the AI to match your brand voice and workflows.

steps.title: Launch & Scale
steps.description: Deploy your AI chatbot and watch it handle thousands of conversations effortlessly.

cta.title: Ready to Transform Your Customer Experience?
cta.description: Get in touch with our team to discuss how AI can help your business grow.

footer.description: Building intelligent AI solutions that transform how businesses connect with their customers.

Index.title: Next 15 Template with i18n and Shadcn UI
Index.description: A powerful starting point for your next multilingual, accessible web application.
Index.OmitRTLInstruction: To use OmitRTL, simply wrap the component you want to omit RTL support for with the OmitRTL component.
